about_the_game:
Explore a post-apocalyptic world
You haven't been here in years, and when you come back everything is destroyed. Figure out what happened, discover long lost secrets and behold the horrific scenery. Each point in the game allows you to openly explore the area and figure out a way to escape into the next dystopian landscape.

Gather resources and craft tools
Find materials around the old wasteland, use them to craft futuristic tools. These tools can help you navigate the world around you, solve puzzles and fix what is broken.

Evade what lurks in the dark
You aren't alone in this world. there are things out there that what to find you, things that want you gone, that want you to pay for what you did. Run, hide and outsmart these monsters to make your way out.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains many frightening and intense scenes. There is very little violence and some scenes reference the overuse of medical drugs.

short_description: Cory wakes up several years into the future, everything has changed and his friends are missing. Complete puzzles, hide from monsters, explore the world around you and try to find what happened and where your friends are.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian
*languages with full audio support
